body:
This is my first scrimmage with my new Avicus team; FiberGlass!
Sadly due to a combination of factors I played absolutely horribly that scrim. The scrim was also quite short so the video is only four minutes long (it's a highlight video). 

Without further ado, here it is!

I'd also like some feedback, do you enjoy song + voices? Or would you rather one or the other :) 
Any other feedback about the video is also appreciated.

title: Avicus Scrimmage vs Avacadian Heroes

replies.body:
GG
Voices always go better in scrim videos :P
replies.body_tagged:
GG
Voices always go better in scrim videos :P

replies.body: Wow, you beat the AV-Heroes. nice xD
replies.body_tagged: Wow, you beat the AV-Heroes. nice xD

replies.body: Nice one so now Bad Company aren't the only Avicus based team to beat Avicadian Heroes. DAMMIT! xD
replies.body_tagged: Nice one so now Bad Company aren't the only Avicus based team to beat Avicadian Heroes. DAMMIT! xD

replies.body: Good fight, we hope to scrim more when our organisation is better!
replies.body_tagged: Good fight, we hope to scrim more when our organisation is better!

replies.body: Avicus based? FiberGlass is basically space monkey mafia.
replies.body_tagged: Avicus based? FiberGlass is basically space monkey mafia.

replies.body: Gg. I was like the only one on AH who knew what to do. :/
replies.body_tagged: Gg. I was like the only one on AH who knew what to do. :/

replies.body: Actually I'm the only SMM member on it, Zombies was just subbing for us as we needed another player
replies.body_tagged: Actually I'm the only SMM member on it, Zombies was just subbing for us as we needed another player

reply_to.body: Avicus based? FiberGlass is basically space monkey mafia.
reply_to.body_tagged: Avicus based? FiberGlass is basically space monkey mafia.

replies.body: Yeah, no offence but it was really obvious most of your team had no idea how to play that map. There was no organised pushes, no stairbridge attempts. When you did get a stair you forgot about it and tried to make another. That and the fact you didn't hold frontline, you took right frontline once and left twice, but just tried to sword rush and not hold it.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, no offence but it was really obvious most of your team had no idea how to play that map. There was no organised pushes, no stairbridge attempts. When you did get a stair you forgot about it and tried to make another. That and the fact you didn't hold frontline, you took right frontline once and left twice, but just tried to sword rush and not hold it.

replies.body: Nice but maybe play on a DTM map since most avicus players have little to no experience with CTW
